title: How to face Leblanc tips please
body:
Hi 

Whenever I play mid against a Leblanc, I always lose during the laning phase even if I stay under my turret farming I still get harassed by her Q W combo, and even when I stay under my turret, Leblanc will roam and still get kills from other lanes even though I ping "Enemy Is Missing". Yesterday I had a game I was facing a Leblanc, during the whole laning phase all I did was stay under my turret so she couldn't get a full combo of me, that strategy went okay, but Leblanc still managed to get 2 kills from roaming and when she went back into my lane she destroyed me, Leblanc managed to get 20 Mejais stacks by around the 20 minute mark, so we lost the game.
So can someone please give me some tips on how to deal with Leblanc and what champions I should play if I face Leblanc.

Thanks

replies.body: Her counter-play is praying that she disconnects and never reconnects.
rush like negatron cloak then ur good to go

Step 1. Buy wards.
Step 2. Ward top and bottom river.
Step 3. Curl up in a ball somewhere between first and second turret. (crying is optional)
Step 4. Ping when she tries to roam and passes a ward.

Galio... or get a runepage and call it "vs leblanc" and take 3 Mr Quints as well as 9 MR glyphs for +24 starting MR, then rush a challice/negatron cloak. also try getting a pink ward and placing it in the river so that your bot lane can see when lb is coming. and use the very loud red ping when you ping MIA.

i tried the runepage
does jack shit if you're a squishy

only reduces like around 50 dmg early, which won't stop her from 100-0 me
try mixing the high Mr from runes with a rod of ages/pots spam since health really complements the Magic resist. also don't let lb auto attack you alot since it hurts early.

Thank you very much!
Any other tips in facing Leblanc will be great as well :D

There is two easy ways to beat LB
1) Push her hard, she really struggles to farm under the turret and will use up her mana quickly using her W
2) Get a a tanky champ like Galio or Morde and shove the crap out of your lane using MR runes. Both these champs counter the crap out of her due to their shield and it is hilarious watching her try to damage you. Just push and focus on csing whilst making sure you ward as you will be getting ganked without a doubt

You say your problem is that she harrasses you under the tower. You should never let her be in this position as it's very easy for her to punish you and it also gives her the chance to roam as she has you pushed. 

I personally play Malzahar against her (well...against pretty much everyone tbh) as your E and W push the lane and if she wants to farm she will get her E on her. If you have a voidling out it will absolutely destroy her. If she W's in to harrass you post 6 you just ult her and watch her die. 

LB sucks at farming without blue so if she has you pushed there is something wrong going on. Push her and watch her suck at csing

Stay out of her W range when possible.
If she Q's you avoid her until the mark disappears
Stay behind your minions so she can't E you.
Push her into tower. She will have to focus on CS'ing rather than harassing you and she will lose farm since LB does poorly farming under turret. You have to take advantage of her from level 1 when she's at her weakest and you can control her for most the early game.

If you can play champs that can either avoid her damage like Zed or Fizz or champions that can lock her down when she jumps in, like Syndra, Morgana or Annie. If you get really good, Diana can interrupt LB's W with her E and then Q+R her to mess her up.

If you can counter pick against her, and you're decent with him, take zed. He takes a huge dump on her past level 6, and a rushed brutalizer negates her seekers.

Basically, you want a champ that has very high burst, with lots of mobility/juking potential, so you can avoid her E and W while being able to return almost instantly to deal your burst. AFAIK, only Zed really has this.

Thank you very much!
Any other tips in facing Leblanc will be great as well :D
